2) Send me a pull request
3) I will merge and deploy
4) If I'm unavailable, I'll tap someone else for the job

<@U0EL0GLEL> <@U2670DYLE> <@U243UT96G>  I think I finally cleaned up this file naming nonsense. The repo was holding a version of each file. I deleted the camelcase one, but Mac thinks that's the non-camel-case, so when you pull it'll delete it. Just do ```git reset --hard HEAD``` after you pull and you'll get the file back. Should be good after that.
Make absolutely sure you've either checked in and pushed all your changes or stashed them when you do the reset.
Question on the Rotate Screen button: should it only be on the Main screen? or all screens?
Defer to <@U0HP6TFNX> here but my opinion is that Rotate Button Only be on Home screen of Podium

scenario: a host stands in the orientation facing the wall, brings up a story, then reaches a point in the conversation where it makes sense to walk inside the exhibit. they don't want to go home and start over, they want to keep talking but move around

<@U243UT96G> and <@U2670DYLE> Since I've had to track this down in a few places: please use ng-src in all your img tags:

```<img class="image {{img.class}}" ng-style="img.style" ng-src="{{img.value}}">```

handlebars don't resolve inline with just src

nitiative + Story + Story Details 1
doesnt make sense
that image doesnt show a details
it just shows a story

the layout i have has the image on the first panel, not the second, its one or the other
<@U02F9CXTL> do you recall the rationale for these different layouts?
there isnt a change in the data, there shouldnt be a different layout
…the difference between pgs 14 and 15
thats fine - was just trying to break things up n the layout - if we only had a story with not details -
<@U0EL0GLEL>
15 is trying to say there is a detial but there isnt one in the image
is it a matter of a Detail existing but not being displayed at that moment on 15?
you wouldnt do that tho
as opposed to there being no Detail that exists for the story on 14
the detail would show on selection of the story
as opposed to Hero being the primary detail? and in the case of no details, the only “detail"
the data in the far right would be where the child data is, there isnt anything there, so no child data, this is the same thing as if there wasnt child data

its a missleading image, this is the issue im having. it gets very confusing looking at these if they are showing states that dont exist, there would be child data there if there was details. there isnt a state where it just doesnt show
that’s fine. i’m simply exporting updates states for what’s already existed design-wise, it may be irrelevant at this point. and if others are fine I can remove it

if 14 is the state with no children, i will need to adjust that template to move it over, that is fine. and 15 is the state where there are children, then that makes more sense. was just clicking thru the raw images and was very confusing
i also may be missing other decisions/changes that have been made so please let me know if i need to update/add/remove anything
